meta.article_title: April 8, 2013 - Covering and Recovering From the Middle

covering-and-recovering-from-the-middle.probleme: Covering middle shots and recovering for the next shot

debutant: favor backhand if rushed or close to the table
favor forehand if off the table

exercices_complementaires.description: Play a middle shot and rapidly get back into position to cover for the next shot.

erreurs_a_eviter: leaving the wide forehand open after a backhand from the middle
